title: Airtable + Make.com Roofing App Backend

description: Streamlined messy CRMs and built automated sales machines for fast-scaling companies. Organized pipelines, set up workflows, and brought clarity to sales ops.

description: Developing an AI-driven scheduling system to optimize manufacturing workflows. Coordinates employee breaks to ensure continuous machine operation and generates daily production schedules based on volume inputs.

description: Streamlining business processes by designing and optimizing automated workflows. Integrating various applications via Zapier to improve efficiency and save resources.

description: Integrated ChatGPT with Google Calendar and Email via Zapier to creating an intelligent daily briefing system. Automates schedule analysis and generates smart daily reminders.

description: Implemented full onboarding automation for a Roofing Agency. Contracts trigger folder creation, CRM updates, and team notifications, saving 15 hours per week.

title: Lead Gen Speed-to-Lead System

title: SEO Agency Automated Reporting
description: Eliminated manual reporting by automating data collection from GSC, Ahrefs, and GA4 into a centralized dashboard. Saved the founder 120 hours/year.
